start.speaker: kiupita
start.text: I... I don't think this is working out.

scene_02.speaker: kiupita
scene_02.text: I've been trying to connect with you, but it feels like you don't really care.

scene_03.speaker: kiupita
scene_03.text: I think it's best if we just... keep our distance from now on.

scene_04.text: Kiupita walks away, and you realize you've lost something precious.

scene_05.text: The rest of the year passes in uncomfortable silence whenever you see each other.

final.text: BAD ENDING - Your relationship deteriorated beyond repair. Sometimes, you can't take back hurtful actions.
